hero.description: I'm a cybersecurity enthusiast specialized in offensive security. I started as a programmer, having my first contact with the Java language at the age of 11. Over time, I came across the information security area, in which I have been self-taught since 2018, and I follow a routine of constant study and practice.
hero.title: Hello, friend! I'm sim0wn, an ethical hacker.

quote.message: Be curious. Read widely. Try new things. What people call intelligence just boils down to curiosity.
quote.author: Aaron Swartz

activities.title: Activities
activities.description: Here are some of my recent activities and projects.

Metadata.description: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm sim0wn, an ethical hacker and cybersecurity enthusiast. Here you can find my projects, books, and ways to contact me.
